types.name: BoolConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to a boolean value.

types.name: ByteConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to a byte value.

types.name: CharConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to a character value.

types.name: DecimalConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to a decimal number.

types.name: DoubleConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to a double-precision floating-point value.

types.name: FloatConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to a single-precision floating point.

types.name: IntConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to an integer value.

types.name: LongConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to a long integer value.

types.name: SByteConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to a signed byte value.

types.name: ShortConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to a short value.

types.name: StringConverter
types.summary: Converts a quoted string to a normal string.

types.name: UIntConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to an unsigned integer.

types.name: ULongConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to an unsigned long integer.

types.name: UShortConverter
types.summary: Converts a string to an unsigned short.
